pr_title: Turn transform definition into configuration style

timeline.message: [DO NOT MERGE] Turn transform definition into configuration style
checkstyle, default transformation, and rename some CompactAction properties
fix test. Remove unnecessary exception messages

timeline.bodyText: Do we have to get rid of this?
timeline.author: gpang
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -44,10 +44,6 @@
    * Compacted files are stored under this directory.
    */
   private final String mOutput;
-  /**
-   * The type of database to write the compacted table to.
-   */
-  private final String mDatabaseType;

replies.bodyText: not necessarily. But it's really odd because it's basically unused.
replies.author: bradyoo

timeline.author: gpang

timeline.bodyText: what happens with actions with the same number?
timeline.author: gpang

replies.bodyText: current behavior is undefined. Would we prefer to define it?
replies.author: bradyoo

replies.bodyText: it doesnt have to be defined now, but at least the javadoc should state that the behavior is undefined.
replies.author: gpang

timeline.bodyText: Could name still be useful? Or does class name provide the same functionality as name?
timeline.author: gpang

replies.bodyText: name was previously used to determine the name of the function which doesn't have a use anymore. We could do something that warrants reintroduction but nothing yet.
replies.author: bradyoo

timeline.bodyText: do we have a test for ordering?
timeline.author: gpang

replies.bodyText: Nothing here because there are no other TransformActions.
replies.author: bradyoo

timeline.bodyText: is there a way to avoid this traversal, and look it up somehow?
timeline.author: gpang

replies.bodyText: It may be worth it when FACTORIES is a longer list, but it's just so short right now..
replies.author: bradyoo

replies.bodyText: I see, then can we add a TODO mentioning that possible improvement for the future?
replies.author: gpang

timeline.bodyText: if it is null, how does the error handling work?
timeline.author: gpang

replies.bodyText: it's not an error for it be to null. It means that the action is unnecessary.
replies.author: bradyoo

timeline.bodyText: Why does this return a list of actions? Can you update javadoc description and return comment.
timeline.author: gpang

replies.bodyText: Can you update the javadoc with the return description and method description? (why is it a list?)
replies.author: gpang

timeline.bodyText: Do you have an example of this string? What does it print if it no longer has a name?
timeline.author: gpang

replies.bodyText: Can you comment on what this would look like?
replies.author: gpang

replies.bodyText:
Registered Transform actions: alluxio.table.common.transform.action.EarlyActionFactory@4909b8da,CompactActionFactory,alluxio.table.common.transform.action.LateActionFactory@3a03464
CompactActionFactory has a toString implementation, the other 2 don't.
replies.author: bradyoo

timeline.author: gpang

replies.bodyText: It's for the case when transformations need to be chained and therefore, for every transformation after the first, you need to deleteSrc.
replies.author: bradyoo

timeline.bodyText: is this allowed to return null as a return value?
timeline.author: gpang

replies.bodyText: Yes. That means Compact is unnecessary.
replies.author: bradyoo

timeline.bodyText: Is there a test that tests for normalization of transformation definitions?
timeline.author: gpang

timeline.bodyText: can you add to the javadoc on what a null return value is supposed to represent?
timeline.author: gpang
